column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A crackdown on illegal online gambling in central Siem Reap saw 13 Chinese suspects arrested at 15:00 on June 13
column8: Siem Reap Province.------The provincial military police detained 13 suspects
column9: including two women.------Police say that this was an unlawful gambling case (gambling on the Internet) and took away exhibits including six laptops (Lenovo 02
